contents.item: You cannot appreciate God without appreciating people
To live a selfish life is the fastest track to catastrophe
Life is about fruitfulness
You have to discover the essence of your creation
We are carriers of God
What you do with your time daily is essential for spiritual and physical growth
You reproduce your life only when you work in the area of your calling
There is no communication with God without communication with God’s people
Getting employment is equivalent to cutting your life into pieces bit by bit
Getting fired from work paves way for a new beginning
We all have the potential to be great and the seed of greatness
An effective life is a life of purpose
Your calling helps you to have goals
Dedicate time to discovering yourself and find out the purpose of your creation
Effectiveness of love must be measured by concrete results
Your calling is buried in your background and life experience
Always appreciate the good in people
Your calling is in your difference and uniqueness
The life in our possession is our time
Nothing exists that is more valuable than time
You love God by showing love to His creations
Those who waste time eventually become wasted
You cannot cherish God without loving people
You can be your own boss
Make optimum use of every second that passes daily
Make sure everything you do is targeted at yielding maximum results
We were built differently, locate you own calling and explore it
Man’s inner content is the worth of his life
Don’t make your job your permanent assignment. Rather, make your work your permanent assignment
Love is about sharing
Until you discover what you can do with your time, you won’t know how to go about crucial things
Stop wasting your life and discover who you are
Always spend your time on things that add value and purpose to your life
Our attitude to others dictates God’s attitude to us
Invest in yourself by discovering your gift
Don’t neglect or ignore every second that passes
You can only derive pleasure from work when it is in the sphere of your calling
Our fellowship with God cannot be established when we don’t recognize His people
The first thing to do after you get fired is to discover God
We should be blessings to others as believers
Losing your job gives you access to time
You are the center of your life
A product should be made intentionally
As humans, we should be able to answer the question: “What do you do with your time?
When you are unemployed, weekends are seven days long.
Don’t fellowship with people around you alone, explore and reach out to more people
Monitor and control every passing day so as to live without regrets
Our fellowship is with God and His people
Life is the totality of time
Until you fight the battle against time, you won’t know how best to manage your time
We bring glory to the Kingdom when we fellowship with one another
You get diminishing returns when you are restricted to your comfort zone
All money comes from the worth of time
Employment deprives you of innovations
The totality of your commitment will make you more efficient
We were sent to earth to fulfill our mandate and life’s purpose
You have to bring relevance to people before teaching them the ways of Christ
Fulfilling purpose is the major key to being productive in life
When you increase and multiply, you get much more influence and reach beyond your imagination
Always live in active consciousness
Life is the subtotal of time
Your life would never have a meaning if you don’t have a goal or purpose
We are capable of anything and everything
Be always employed to something useful.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

contents.item: Joblessness gives you unlimited access to wealth
Humans are created out of time
Fellowship with human beings opens up to fellowship with God
Time is the content of life
Your net worth determines how valuable you are in the sight of men
The value of a substance is the product of the time spent to achieve it
Convert your knowledge into product
You don’t count or matter when you don’t live an effective life
Employment is the greatest dream killer
Our service as believers is not complete without fellowship with people
Service to God is largely unacceptable without service to men
Never allow a minute to pass without asking yourself what you did with the time
To work (at a job) is to sacrifice the life you have at the moment
You need focus and concentration to be effective in life
Everything you have was bought with the currency of time
You can become great through the power of time
A busy life is not necessarily an effective life
Your intensity increases your net worth
You attract poverty when you lack value for time
Brotherly love should be our number one principle as believers
Making a product is just an activity, making a profit on a product is the achievement.
Be intentional and purposeful in your calling
Break free from the contract of employment
Living for your purpose is equivalent to living for the Kingdom of God
The material of life is made from time
If you don’t pursue purpose, you won’t know what to with your time
